Operation 'recommender.projects.locations.insightTypes.insights.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Added context about insight structure, pagination support, and explicit reference to response schema for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Lists insights for the specified Cloud Resource. Requires the recommender.*.list IAM permission for the specified insight type.
data.summary_suggestion: List insights for a Cloud Resource
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of insights for the specified Cloud Resource within a given location and insight type. Each insight includes analysis data and associated recommendations. Requires the recommender.*.list IAM permission for the specified insight type. Supports pagination via filter and pageSize parameters. Returns a GoogleCloudRecommenderV1ListInsightsResponse containing insights and a next page token if applicable.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what insights are, expected parameters (parent, filter, pageSize), pagination support, and return type. Added context about insight structure, pagination support, and explicit reference to response schema for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Lists recommendations for the specified Cloud Resource. Requires the recommender.*.list IAM permission for the specified recommender.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of recommendations for the specified Cloud Resource within a given location and recommender type. Each recommendation includes suggested actions and potential impact analysis. Requires the recommender.*.list IAM permission for the specified recommender. data.current_description: Gets the requested insight. Requires the recommender.*.get IAM permission for the specified insight type.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific insight by name

data.current_description: Updates an InsightTypeConfig change. This will create a new revision of the config.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the configuration for a specific insight type. The operation creates a new revision of the InsightTypeConfig, preserving the previous version in the configuration history. Accepts a GoogleCloudRecommenderV1InsightTypeConfig object with updated settings. Returns the updated configuration with the new revision.
